cestinoMessages.message: I know it feels good to click this button
buttons nowadays are not as clickable as they used to be
everything made in the past was better
but we remember the good time
as if nothing bad ever happened

brokenScreenMessages: You're no match for my bugs, you poor fool!
HURRY UP! before Cestino destroys the whole system!
Only a real 10x developer can defeat me
You'll never make it in time for the release!
Do you work until 9pm on Fridays?
I wasn't expecting you to be that good...
